BLG

Hello, I'm Brian Gomez and I'm a Full-Stack Developer

BIO

I am currently a PhD student at Southeastern Baptist Theological Seminary (SEBTS) in Wake Forest, NC. All my life I have loved and been involved with various technologies, but at the end of 2019 I made the move to work in this industry as a Full-Stack Developer. Prior to this, I worked in administration in the Office of Hispanic Leadership Development at SEBTS and as a manager at PPG Paints in Miami, Florida.

Freelance

Full Stack Developer

Since December 2019 I have been doing freelance Full-Stack development for clients.

SEBTS

Hispanic Leadership Development

From Spring of 2017 through the end of 2019 I worked at SEBTS in the office of Hispanic Leadership Development. My role included collaborating with the director in development and expansion of HLD relationships and programs. I also translating various documents, including MOUs, syllabi, class notes, and articles and issued reimbursements through Expensify.

SEBTS

PhD Student |Grader |Teaching Assistant

I am currently a PhD student studying philosophy and theology at SEBTS. I am also currently a grader and teaching assistant at the seminary.
